title: Wait, just a second, is your doctor listening?

title_detail.value: Wait, just a second, is your doctor listening?

summary: On average, patients get about 11 seconds to explain the reasons for their visit before they are interrupted by their doctors. Also, only one in three doctors provides their patients with adequate opportunity to describe their situation. The pressure to rush consultations affects specialists more than primary care doctors.
